info.description: API to retrieve and manage external user preferences and profiles
info.title: Management of external users

get.description: Retrieves the details of logged in external user.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Id of the (digital) channel

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.description: Retrieves the list of external user preferences for logged in user

parameters.name: externalUserPreferencesId
parameters.description: Denotes the preference identifier for the external user

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

put.description: This API is used to update the external user status, Such as ACTIVE, INITIATED ,etc. And also used to update the terms and condition information and language for the external user

parameters.name: externalUserId
parameters.description: Contains the external user identifier for which the consent is created.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

channels.description: Contains the channel in which the activity was performed. If pricing is not determined based on channel, then this is not significant

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

arrangementCustomerId.description: Customer id details of the specific arrangement

arrangementCustomerName.description: Customer name details of the specific arrangement

subArrangementName.description: The name of the sub arrangement that is displayed.

termsAccepted.description: Defines whether the user has accepted the Terms and Conditions first displayed when the user logs in to the system for the very first time.

loginMethod.description: The type of login method e.g. password, PIN, OTP

dateLastUsed.description: The last Date and time when the Customer logged in to the Digital Channel

timeLastUsed.description: Indicates the time stamp at which the transaction history for the account is retrieved

smsNumber.description: The mobile SMS number of the customer

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect

localCurrencyId.description: The ISO code (3 letters) for the institution's local currency.

countryId.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

currentWorkingDate.description: Date of the current business day for all online activities in the selected Company. This field is updated automatically with the date from 'nextWorkingDay' during the Close of Business processing.

companyId.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

noOfArrangements.description: View the no of arrangement details

externalUserName.description: External or Digital Channel User Name

externalUserSignMethod.description: External user sign in channels details

languageId.description: Represents the language code of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

holdingsAvailable.description: Available account details for a customer

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

balanceProductLines.description: Id of the product line (e.g. DEPOSITS), which is used in the calculation of the total balance.

balanceProductLine.description: Id of the product line (e.g. DEPOSITS), which is used in the calculation of the total balance.

serviceNames.description: The service related to an arrangement

serviceName.description: The service related to an arrangement

externalUserPreferenceId.description: The identifier of the external user's preferences

groupName.description: The name that is displayed for the group

groupDisplayName.description: Display the details of group name

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

channels.description: Contains the channel in which the activity was performed. If pricing is not determined based on channel, then this is not significant

externalUserStatus.description: External User Access status. Can be Active,  Inactive, Barred, Initiated

termsAccepted.description: Defines whether the user has accepted the Terms and Conditions first displayed when the user logs in to the system for the very first time.

languageId.description: Represents the language code of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

productLineId.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

product.description: Specifies the list of products licensed for the institution. This will be used to set the products field in the SPF (System Parameter) table and the master company. The products in the company can only be subset of the products in the SPF table.

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

balanceProductLine.description: Id of the product line (e.g. DEPOSITS), which is used in the calculation of the total balance.

balanceProductGroup.description: View the product group details of customer

serviceNames.description: The service related to an arrangement

serviceName.description: The service related to an arrangement

groupName.description: The name that is displayed for the group

groupDisplayName.description: Display the details of group name
